#summary This page describes the XML Media Source plugin.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This plugin is used to maintain a persistent media list over runs of the server. Without this plugin, or one like it, the media list is lost and must be rescanned.

= Configuration =

This plugin is set up in the modules section of the JemsConfig.xml file.

{{{
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?> 
<jems>
  <modules>
    ...
    <module name="XML Media List" class="net.kodeninja.jem.server.content.xml.XMLMediaSource">
      <path>medialist.xml</path>
    </module>
    ...
  </modules>
  ...
</jems>
}}}
Figure 1.1 - _Sample module definition_

The configuration for this module is simple and only contains one sub tag: `path`. This holds the path to the xml file that stores the media list.
